system:
note description: "Rectangular areas." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2014-04-16 16:57:30 -0700 (Wed, 16 Apr 2014) $" revision: "$Revision: 94880 $"
class ../interface/ev_rectangle.xmlEV_RECTANGLE
inherit FalseDEBUG_OUTPUT redefine ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_outout end
create Falsedefault_create, ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_makemake, ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_setset
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_make../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_makemake (a_x, a_y, a_width, a_height: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Initialize with a_x, a_y, a_width, a_height. -- Was declared in ../interface/ev_rectangle.xmlEV_RECTANGLE as synonym of ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_setset. require a_width_positive: a_width >= 0 a_height_positive: a_height >= 0 do ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_xx := a_x ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_yy := a_y ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_widthwidth := a_width ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_heightheight := a_height end
f_set../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_setset (a_x, a_y, a_width, a_height: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Initialize with a_x, a_y, a_width, a_height. -- Was declared in ../interface/ev_rectangle.xmlEV_RECTANGLE as synonym of ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_makemake. require a_width_positive: a_width >= 0 a_height_positive: a_height >= 0 do ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_xx := a_x ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_yy := a_y ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_widthwidth := a_width ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_heightheight := a_height end
feature -- Access
f_x../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_xx: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Horizontal position.
f_y../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_yy: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Vertical position.
f_width../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_widthwidth: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Width of Current.
f_height../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_heightheight: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Height of Current.
f_left../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_leftleft: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Horizontal position of left side do Result := ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_xx end
f_top../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_toptop: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Vertical position of top. do Result := ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_yy end
f_right../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_rightright: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Horizontal position of right side. do Result := ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_xx + ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_widthwidth end
f_bottom../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_bottombottom: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Vertical position of bottom. do Result := ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_yy + ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_heightheight end
feature -- Status report
f_has_area../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_has_areahas_area: FalseBOOLEAN -- Does Current have area? do Result := ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_widthwidth > 0 and then ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_heightheight > 0 end
f_upper_left../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_upper_leftupper_left: ../interface/ev_coordinate.xmlEV_COORDINATE -- Upper-left corner of Current. do create Result.../interface/ev_coordinate.xml#f_setset (../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_leftleft, ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_toptop) ensure result_exists: Result /= Void result_assigned: Result.../interface/ev_coordinate.xml#f_xx = ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_xx and then Result.../interface/ev_coordinate.xml#f_yy = ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_yy end
f_upper_right../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_upper_rightupper_right: ../interface/ev_coordinate.xmlEV_COORDINATE -- Upper-right corner of Current. do create Result.../interface/ev_coordinate.xml#f_setset (../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_rightright, ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_toptop) ensure result_exists: Result /= Void result_assigned: Result.../interface/ev_coordinate.xml#f_xx = ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_xx + ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_widthwidth and then Result.../interface/ev_coordinate.xml#f_yy = ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_yy end
f_lower_left../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_lower_leftlower_left: ../interface/ev_coordinate.xmlEV_COORDINATE -- Lower-left corner of Current. do create Result.../interface/ev_coordinate.xml#f_setset (../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_leftleft, ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_bottombottom) ensure result_exists: Result /= Void result_assigned: Result.../interface/ev_coordinate.xml#f_xx = ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_xx and then Result.../interface/ev_coordinate.xml#f_yy = ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_yy + ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_heightheight end
f_lower_right../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_lower_rightlower_right: ../interface/ev_coordinate.xmlEV_COORDINATE -- Lower-right corner of Current. do create Result.../interface/ev_coordinate.xml#f_setset (../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_rightright, ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_bottombottom) ensure result_exists: Result /= Void result_assigned: Result.../interface/ev_coordinate.xml#f_xx = ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_xx + ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_widthwidth and then Result.../interface/ev_coordinate.xml#f_yy = ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_yy + ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_heightheight end
feature -- Status report
f_has../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_hashas (c: ../interface/ev_coordinate.xmlEV_COORDINATE): FalseBOOLEAN -- Is c inside Current? require c_not_void: c /= Void do Result := c.../interface/ev_coordinate.xml#f_xx >= ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_leftleft and then c.../interface/ev_coordinate.xml#f_xx <= ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_rightright and then c.../interface/ev_coordinate.xml#f_yy >= ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_toptop and then c.../interface/ev_coordinate.xml#f_yy <= ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_bottombottom end
f_has_x_y../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_has_x_yhas_x_y (a_x, a_y: FalseINTEGER_32): FalseBOOLEAN -- Is (a_x, a_y) inside Current? local l_x, l_y: FalseINTEGER_32 do l_x := ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_xx l_y := ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_yy Result := a_x >= l_x and then a_x <= l_x + ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_widthwidth and then a_y >= l_y and then a_y <= l_y + ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_heightheight end
f_contains../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_containscontains (other: like Current): FalseBOOLEAN -- Does Current contain other entirely? do Result := ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_xx <= other.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_xx and ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_yy <= other.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_yy and other.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_bottombottom <= ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_bottombottom and other.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_rightright <= ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_rightright end
f_intersects../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_intersectsintersects (other: like Current): FalseBOOLEAN -- Does other at least partially overlap Current? require other_not_void: other /= Void do Result := ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_has_areahas_area and then other.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_has_areahas_area and then not (../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_leftleft >= other.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_rightright or ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_rightright <= other.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_leftleft or ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_toptop >= other.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_bottombottom or ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_bottombottom <= other.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_toptop) end
f_intersection../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_intersectionintersection (other: like Current): like Current -- Intersection of other with Current. -- If there is not intersection Result has default values. require other_not_void: other /= Void local l_top, l_bottom, l_left, l_right: FalseINTEGER_32 do create Result if ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_intersectsintersects (other) then l_top := ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_toptop.Falsemax (other.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_toptop) l_bottom := ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_bottombottom.Falsemin (other.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_bottombottom) l_left := ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_leftleft.Falsemax (other.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_leftleft) l_right := ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_rightright.Falsemin (other.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_rightright) if l_top < 0 then Result.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_set_topset_top (l_top) Result.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_set_bottomset_bottom (l_bottom) else Result.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_set_bottomset_bottom (l_bottom) Result.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_set_topset_top (l_top) end if l_left < 0 then Result.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_set_leftset_left (l_left) Result.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_set_rightset_right (l_right) else Result.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_set_rightset_right (l_right) Result.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_set_leftset_left (l_left) end end ensure result_not_void: Result /= Void result_intersects_if_not_default: Result.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_widthwidth /= 0 or else Result.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_heightheight /= 0 implies Result.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_intersectsintersects (other) result_default_if_no_intersection: Result.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_widthwidth = 0 or else Result.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_heightheight = 0 implies not Result.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_intersectsintersects (other) end
feature -- Element change
f_include_point../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_include_pointinclude_point (c: ../interface/ev_coordinate.xmlEV_COORDINATE) -- Enlarge so that c is in Current. require c_not_void: c /= Void do ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_includeinclude (c.../interface/ev_coordinate.xml#f_xx, c.../interface/ev_coordinate.xml#f_yy) ensure has_c: ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_hashas (c) end
f_include../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_includeinclude (a_x, a_y: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Enlarge so that a_x, a_y is in Current. do ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_set_leftset_left (../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_leftleft.Falsemin (a_x)) ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_set_topset_top (../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_toptop.Falsemin (a_y)) ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_set_rightset_right (../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_rightright.Falsemax (a_x)) ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_set_bottomset_bottom (../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_bottombottom.Falsemax (a_y)) end
f_merge../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_mergemerge (other: like Current) -- Enlarge Current so that other fits inside. require other_not_void: other /= Void do ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_set_leftset_left (../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_leftleft.Falsemin (other.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_leftleft)) ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_set_topset_top (../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_toptop.Falsemin (other.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_toptop)) ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_set_rightset_right (../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_rightright.Falsemax (other.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_rightright)) ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_set_bottomset_bottom (../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_bottombottom.Falsemax (other.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_bottombottom)) end
f_grow_left../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_grow_leftgrow_left (i: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Increment size by i to west. require ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_widthwidth + i > 0 do ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_xx := ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_xx - i ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_widthwidth := ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_widthwidth + i end
f_grow_right../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_grow_rightgrow_right (i: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Increment size by i to east. do ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_widthwidth := ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_widthwidth + i end
f_grow_top../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_grow_topgrow_top (i: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Increment size by i to north. require ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_heightheight + i > 0 do ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_yy := ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_yy - i ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_heightheight := ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_heightheight + i end
f_grow_bottom../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_grow_bottomgrow_bottom (i: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Increment size by i to south. do ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_heightheight := ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_heightheight + i end
f_set_left../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_set_leftset_left (i: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Assign i to ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_leftleft. require i <= ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_rightright do ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_widthwidth := ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_widthwidth - i + ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_xx ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_xx := i ensure assigned: ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_leftleft = i right_same: ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_rightright = old ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_rightright end
f_set_right../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_set_rightset_right (i: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Assign i to ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_rightright. require i - ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_xx >= 0 do ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_widthwidth := i - ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_xx ensure assigned: ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_rightright = i end
f_set_top../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_set_topset_top (i: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Assign i to ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_toptop. require i <= ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_bottombottom do ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_heightheight := ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_heightheight - i + ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_yy ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_yy := i ensure assigned: ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_toptop = i bottom_same: ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_bottombottom = old ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_bottombottom end
f_set_bottom../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_set_bottomset_bottom (i: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Assign i to ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_bottombottom. require i - ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_yy >= 0 do ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_heightheight := i - ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_yy ensure assigned: ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_bottombottom = i end
f_set_x../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_set_xset_x (new_x: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Assign new_x to ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_xx. do ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_xx := new_x ensure x_set: ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_xx = new_x end
f_set_y../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_set_yset_y (new_y: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Assign new_y to ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_yy. do ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_yy := new_y ensure y_set: ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_yy = new_y end
f_set_width../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_set_widthset_width (new_width: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Assign new_width to 'width'. require new_width_positive: new_width >= 0 do ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_widthwidth := new_width ensure width_assigned: ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_widthwidth = new_width end
f_set_height../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_set_heightset_height (new_height: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Assign new_height to ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_heightheight. require new_height_positive: new_height >= 0 do ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_heightheight := new_height ensure height_assigned: ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_heightheight = new_height end
f_resize../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_resizeresize (a_width, a_height: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Resize to a_width and a_height. require a_width_positive: a_width >= 0 a_height_positive: a_height >= 0 do ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_widthwidth := a_width ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_heightheight := a_height ensure width_assigned: ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_widthwidth = a_width height_assigned: ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_heightheight = a_height end
f_move../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_movemove (a_x, a_y: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Move to a_x and a_y. do ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_xx := a_x ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_yy := a_y ensure x_assigned: ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_xx = a_x y_assigned: ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_yy = a_y end
f_move_and_resize../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_move_and_resizemove_and_resize (a_x, a_y, a_width, a_height: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Move to a_x and a_y and resize to a_width and a_height. require a_width_positive: a_width >= 0 a_height_positive: a_height >= 0 do ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_xx := a_x ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_yy := a_y ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_widthwidth := a_width ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_heightheight := a_height ensure x_assigned: ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_xx = a_x y_assigned: ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_yy = a_y width_assigned: ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_widthwidth = a_width height_assigned: ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_heightheight = a_height end
feature -- Output
f_debug_output../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_debug_outputdebug_output: FalseSTRING_8 -- Return readable string. -- Was declared in ../interface/ev_rectangle.xmlEV_RECTANGLE as synonym of ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_outout. do Result := "(X: " + ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_xx.Falseout + ", Y: " + ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_yy.Falseout + ", Width: " + ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_widthwidth.Falseout + ", Height: " + ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_heightheight.Falseout + ")" end
f_out../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_outout: FalseSTRING_8 -- Return readable string. -- Was declared in ../interface/ev_rectangle.xmlEV_RECTANGLE as synonym of ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_debug_outputdebug_output. do Result := "(X: " + ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_xx.Falseout + ", Y: " + ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_yy.Falseout + ", Width: " + ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_widthwidth.Falseout + ", Height: " + ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_heightheight.Falseout + ")" end
invariant width_positive: ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_widthwidth >= 0 height_positive: ../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_heightheight >= 0
